typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Dwhsource
Dwhsource sink(input(
		MovieSK as integer,
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		MovieCategorySK as integer,
		MovieRatingSK as integer,
		MovieRunTimeMin as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> DwhSinkMovies
